sentences.en: a book about the life and manners of Victorian London
sentences.cn: 一本关于维多利亚时期伦敦的生活和习俗的书

sentences.en: Bruno has not got his younger brother's jokey manner.
sentences.cn: 布鲁诺还无法理解他弟弟诙谐的举止。

sentences.en: criticism of the manner in which the bishop was appointed
sentences.cn: 对主教任命方式的批评

sentences.en: Cross was a little taken aback by her abrupt manner.
sentences.cn: 她鲁莽的态度让克罗斯感到有点吃惊。

sentences.en: He felt some guilt over the manner of her death.
sentences.cn: 她以这种方式死去，他心里有些内疚。

sentences.en: Her children all had such good manners .
sentences.cn: 她的孩子都很有礼貌

sentences.en: Her children all had such good manners.
sentences.cn: 她的孩子都很有礼貌。

sentences.en: Her manner offstage, like her manner on, is somewhat surly.
sentences.cn: 她台下和台上的举止如出一辙，都有些粗暴无礼。

sentences.en: Her manner was quiet and very controlled.
sentences.cn: 她举止文静，而且非常冷静。

sentences.en: His gentle manner and honeyed tones reassured Andrew.
sentences.cn: 他温和的态度和悦耳的语调使安德鲁消除了疑虑。

sentences.en: His manner is not so much regal as professorial.
sentences.cn: 他的言行举止不太像帝王，倒更像学者一些。

sentences.en: His manner was self-assured and brusque.
sentences.cn: 他态度傲慢无礼。

sentences.en: His manners were impeccable .
sentences.cn: 他的礼仪无可挑剔。

sentences.en: His speech and manner are refined.
sentences.cn: 他谈吐优雅，彬彬有礼。

sentences.en: It's a satire somewhat in the manner of Dickens.
sentences.cn: 这部讽刺作品有点狄更斯的风格。

sentences.en: She couldn't stand his blunt, graceless manner.
sentences.cn: 她无法忍受他的唐突和粗鲁。

sentences.en: She has a calm relaxed manner.
sentences.cn: 她举止镇定而从容。

sentences.en: She talked in a grown-up manner.
sentences.cn: 她说起话来像个大人。

sentences.en: Some of the credit for her relaxed manner must go to Andy.
sentences.cn: 她会如此放松，一部分应该归功于安迪。

sentences.en: The Council had acted in a negligent manner.
sentences.cn: 市政会的做法属于失职。

sentences.en: The issue will be resolved in a manner that is fair to both sides.
sentences.cn: 这个问题将用对双方都公平的方式来解决。

sentences.en: There was much curiosity about what manner of man he was.
sentences.cn: 他究竟是什么样的人，大家都十分好奇。

sentences.en: they accuse me of all manner of evil things.
sentences.cn: 他们指责我干了各种各样的坏事。

sentences.en: they accuse me of all manner of evil things.
sentences.cn: 他们指责我干了各种各样的坏事。

sentences.en: We kissed each other's cheeks in the European manner.
sentences.cn: 我们按欧洲人的方式互相亲吻了面颊。

words.tran_cn: 矫饰的；守规矩的；矫揉造作的
特殊习惯；矫揉造作；怪癖

phrases.tran_cn: 各种各样的，形形色色的
在某种意义上；在某种程度上
天生就习惯：习惯于一种地位、习俗或生活方式、或天生的或仿佛是天生的

trans.tran_cn: 方式，做法，态度，礼貌，规矩
trans.tran_en: the way in which something is done or happens
